tool_description: Provide access to update Soshio account, manage subscriptions, and generate reports on Chinese social data. *Existing Soshio members only.*
name: Chinese Social Insights
title: Chinese Social Insights

api_list.name: Access Account
api_list.description: Access account information such as created date and consumptions

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: Soshio username. Has to match the authentication credential.

api_list.name: Retrieve Overview
api_list.description: Retrieve the overview on the data analyzed.  **Polling required. The first call will trigger report generation, and the following calls will check the progress and return results if completed.**

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Start UNIX time of the report timeframe.

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: End Unix time of the report timeframe.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Query to generate the report from.

api_list.name: Retrieve Demographics
api_list.description: Retrieve the aggregated demographics on the data analyzed.  **Polling required. The first call will trigger report generation, and the following calls will check the progress and return results if completed.**

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Start UNIX time of the report timeframe.

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: End Unix time of the report timeframe.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Query to generate the report from.

api_list.name: Retrieve Sentiments
api_list.description: Retrieve the aggregated sentiments on the data analyzed.   **Polling required. The first call will trigger report generation, and the following calls will check the progress and return results if completed.**

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Start UNIX time of the report timeframe.

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: End Unix time of the report timeframe.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Query to generate the report from.

api_list.name: Retrieve Contexts
api_list.description: Retrieve the aggregated contexts on the data analyzed.   **Polling required. The first call will trigger report generation, and the following calls will check the progress and return results if completed.**

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Start UNIX time of the report timeframe.

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: End Unix time of the report timeframe.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Query to generate the report from.

api_list.name: List Subscriptions

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: Soshio username. Has to match the authentication credential.

optional_parameters.name: includes_past
optional_parameters.description: Whether or not to include previously subscribed queries.
